articles.title: Why Chen Hanwei doesn't think a Will Smith moment will ever happen to him at the Star Awards - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actor is hosting the live Star Awards show on Apr 24 all on his own, and he’s a little nervous about it. But he seems pretty confident about who he thinks will win in the acting categories.

articles.title: Penang bar listed among 100 best bars in Asia for the first time ever - The Star Online
articles.description: Penang bar Backdoor Bodega has become the first bar from the state to be named in the 51-100 list by the Asia Best 50 Bars.
